title: Himi 438
lyrics:
10.10.10.10.
1.
Afe mai ā he kuo po’uli ē,
He ‘Eiki Koe hoku laumāli
e
!
Ka ‘unu ‘a e kakai ‘o u tuēnoa,
Afe mai ē, ‘o ta fe’ao ā!
2.
‘Oku liliungofua ‘a e tu’u ko en
i
Mo mole vave hono me’a lelei.
Ko Koe taha pe ‘oku tu’uma’u,
‘Ē, afe mai, ‘o nofo ma’u mo au.
3.
ʻĒ, nofo mai! Telia ‘a e ‘ahi’ah
i
;
He ko e houa fē ne ‘ikai fai?
‘Oka totolo mai ‘a e fili ia,
Ko hai mo Koe te ne ‘aofia?
4.
Ka ta ka ō, koe’uma’ā ha kov
i
!
Teu tangi nai kae ‘ikai fuʻu ongo’
i
.
‘O ma’ama’a ‘a e kavenga ia,
Mo va’inga ‘a hoto fatongia.
5.
Ka ta ka ō koe’uma’ā ‘a e Mat
e
!
Talu he ha’
a
ki ia ‘i Kāleval
e
.
Pea ‘e ava ‘a Fa’itoka ia,
‘O u hao atu ki he Kolōlia. *
